description:
The student council visits a mountain and gathers various mushrooms. During a break during school, they get some exercise together, and the school has a Halloween party.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tsuda Kinoko wa Souteinai / Hane ga Tobu / Kabocha no Kimochi
Tsuda`s Mushroom Is as Expected / Flying Wings
津田キノコは想定内 / 羽根が飛ぶ / カボチャの気持ち
